creator: Şımart Teknoloji Sanayi ve Ticaret A.Ş
descriptionHtml:
Producing a pleasant and efficient technology, Şımart Technology makes your life smarter by using IoT Technology.
IoT products of Şımart Technology which make your life more easier ensure that all functions are at your fingertips.
By using the Şımart APP, you can remotely control your Şımart's smart devices, create different scenarios by connecting devices to each other and enjoy your efortless time.
To step into the digital world and get rid of the excess cable, you can start using smart devices through our Şımart APP.
We develop IoT Technologies to add value to your life.
- We care about your ideas -
Please contact us for all your opinions, suggestions and requests;
Customer Service: +90 850 346 61 26
Website: https://www.simart.me/
e-mail: destek@simart.me
descriptionShort: Şımart integrates your homes into the digital world by using IoT Technology.
